description: {"blocks":[{"key":"f7euh","text":"This protocol details the co-expression and purification of DENV2 NS2B-NS3 protease construct bearing a N-terminal His-GST tag at small scale (\u003c6L).\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f6mjb","text":"DVNS2B3 N-terminal His-GST tagged co-expression construct was inoculated from its BL21(DE3)-RR glycerol stock.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46g40","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2n0lq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dpc5c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4c9u9","text":"The DENV2 NS2B-NS3 co-expression construct encodes the NS2B and NS3 protease with a N-terminal His6-GST tag fusion on a kanamycin resistant plasmid backbone with a T7 promoter.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1s9os","text":"When the OD600 approximately 1.8, add 1mM IPTG. Lower the temperature and shaker speed to  . {"blocks":[{"key":"2v8j8","text":"Wash the column with   of base buffer, followed by   of wash buffer 1 and 2. Allow wash buffer to pass through completely between washes. This is to remove non-specific, weak binding of contaminant proteins from the resin for a cleaner elution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b5c9k","text":"Collect washes separately for SDS-PAGE analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3254}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3254}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ccm4","text":"Elute the protein with   of elution buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2.5","concentration":"0.5","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"CDE35FD0A01A11EE951C0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3254}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"67kh0","text":"Repeat step 8.5 one more time, collecting a total of 2 separate elution fractions. This is to ensure maximum retrieval of protein from the resin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4nl3e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8k34v","text":"Measure the total protein concentration of the elutions by Nanodrop. Although still a mixture, A280 value can give an estimate of the protein content, which will determine how much protease need to be added to remove the affinity tag.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3kcdv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5u5kr","text":"For example, E1 = 18.28 mg/mL, E2 = 13.02 mg/mL at 1 A280 unit = 1 mg/mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3picu","text":"(Optional) elute rIMAC resin with   elution buffer to confirm if the protein shows non-specific binding to the resin used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"40cbj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tpu9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3a92e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"frase","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cm0qt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"062E8DB6FE5211EE93260A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3254}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"r8or","text":"This will help determine if the protein is \"sticky\" to the Ni resin matrix material, and help in further troubleshooting if the final yield is lower than expected.
